original_title: Trains disrupted on up-country line due to earth slip
original_body_lines: Train services on the up-country line have been disrupted owing to an earth slip on the tracks between Ohiya and Idalgashinna railway stations, the Sri Lanka Railways said.
Owing to the situation, the Colombo - Badulla night mail train has been stopped at Ohiya railway station.
The railway department said it would take at least 3 hours to clear the tracks and restore the operations on the up-country line.
